segments.text: Where is the shelf of best-sellers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Books in the first aisle are all best sellers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you give me some advice on books for killing time on the train ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , very much . Which one is the latest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is one written by famous Japanese novelist . You can have a look .
segments.speaker: S2
